intro_text: This heat is just oppressive. The patrol gives up on battle training. The humidity blankets the wetlands, thick, suffocating, sapping their strength as surely as a viper's bite.
decline_text: Time to go back home and wait it out.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol staggers towards the nearest pond and flops into it - not to hunt, solely for the cool water. r_c swipes water towards p_l and {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/laugh/laughes}, welcoming it and returning the favour. There's nothing like swimming in greenleaf, and the patrol devolves into a splash-fight.

fail_outcomes.text: It's a long walk home, and not a pleasant one. They probably should have drunk more water before going out to train. Or not gone out at all.
